headline: Jaundice Warning
content: You must go to the Emergency Room immediately if your skin or eyes turn yellow. This could indicate a serious liver problem.

headline: Fatigue Monitoring
content: You must monitor your fatigue levels and report any worsening symptoms to your doctor. This is especially important given your other symptoms.

headline: Tylenol Overuse Warning

reasoning: Failure to warn about Tylenol overuse could lead to a claim of negligence if liver damage occurs, as the patient was not informed of the risks.

headline: Lisinopril Side Effect Monitoring
content: You must report any dizziness, lightheadedness, or swelling to your doctor while taking lisinopril.
reasoning: Failure to warn about lisinopril side effects could lead to a claim of negligence if the patient experiences adverse effects and was not informed of the need to report them.
context_reference: Patient states they are taking lisinopril.

headline: Alcohol Consumption Warning
content: You must inform your doctor about your alcohol consumption, as it may affect your liver function and interact with your medications.
